name: 比奥莱塔·保斯·索托
name_full: 比奥莱塔·保斯·索托 Violeta Paus Soto
introduction: Born in Santiago de Chile in 1987, she studied film at the University of Buenos Aires and visual arts in Chile. Her first documentary, Ajawaska, fragmentos de un viaje a la alturas, was filmed in the Peruvian Andes. In 2014, she moved to Paris where she developed the mulitmedia installation 'Sin Panteón' and worked as a programmer for the Silence on Court! film festival. In 2018, having returned to Chile, she directed the installation 'Re.incorporar' about femicides in South America. She is currently working on a transmedia project about water contamination in Chile.
